name: Margherita Pizza
description: Delicious tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Classic pepperoni slices with melted cheese on top.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: A medley of fresh vegetables and mozzarella cheese.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: Sweet pineapple, ham, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Supreme Pizza
description: Loaded with pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, olives, and mushrooms.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Tender BBQ chicken, red onions, and cheddar cheese.
